label: 公民
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: a commoner. In ritsuryô terms, a free subject of the tennô was termed “a good fellow” (ryômin 良民 ). But the term kômin eventually replaced ryômin to denote a free subject of the tennô’s realm.  [律令] [天皇]
